## Testing Checklist (Required)

- [ ] I added or updated tests for this change.
- [ ] For feature/bugfix changes, I wrote a failing test first (TDD red -> green).
- [ ] For CLI-facing behavior, I added/updated integration tests in behavior style.
- [ ] I ran relevant focused tests locally.
- [ ] I ran full regression (or documented why it was not possible).

## Regression Coverage

- [ ] Bugfix includes at least one regression test that would fail before this fix.
- [ ] Existing behavior remains covered (no silent test removal).

```bash
# Paste exact commands you ran, for example:
# cargo test -p filter-repo-rs --test stream
# cargo test --workspace --all-targets -- --test-threads=1
```
